acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was a gift of Mr. Hester to the department in July of 1990.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Professor at VCU for thirty years. Mr. Hester retired in 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection is primarily correspondence from Windsor Castle and the British Museum to Robert F. Hester concerning materials for his thesis; 12 items; 1961-1962 and one letter from Mrs. Jessie Hibbs (1977).

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged as it was donated by Mr. Hester.
